languages.text: "Я не хочу вести всю свою банду в Увечный сектор — это место прикончит втрое больше бойцов, чем сама шайка Комиссара. Значит, надо подослать убийцу. Но бойцы Комиссара знают моих Ревущих. А тебя не знает никто. И еще — у тебя нет выбора, а значит, ты пойдешь до конца".

"I don't want to drag my whole gang into the Mangled Sector — the place will kill off three times more fighters than the Commissar's crew will. That means I need to send in an assassin. The Commissar's fighters know my Shriekers. But nobody knows you. And besides, you don't have a choice, which means you'll see it through to the end."
languages.original_text: "Я не хочу вести всю свою банду в Увечный сектор — это место прикончит втрое больше бойцов, чем сама шайка Комиссара. Значит, надо подослать убийцу. Но бойцы Комиссара знают моих Ревущих. А тебя не знает никто. И еще — у тебя нет выбора, а значит, ты пойдешь до конца".

traits.locale_text: "I don't want to drag my whole gang into the Mangled Sector — the place will kill off three times more fighters than the Commissar's crew will. That means I need to send in an assassin. The Commissar's fighters know my Shriekers. But nobody knows you. And besides, you don't have a choice, which means you'll see it through to the end."
traits.speaker: Anger

That means I need to send in an assassin. The Commissar's fighters know my Shriekers. But nobody knows you. And besides, you don't have a choice, which means you'll see it through to the end."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: “因为我不想大张旗鼓地冲到崩落区，那个地方会害死我的人。要是我真的硬闯，到时候被那片区域害死的人，和死在政委手上的人相比恐怕会多三倍都不止。也就是说，我需要派一位刺客过去。政委的战士认识我的尖啸者，但没人认识你。而且你也别无选择，也就是说，着件事情你会负责到底。”
languages.original_text: "I don't want to drag my whole gang into the Mangled Sector — the place will kill off three times more fighters than the Commissar's crew will. That means I need to send in an assassin. The Commissar's fighters know my Shriekers. But nobody knows you. And besides, you don't have a choice, which means you'll see it through to the end."

traits.locale_text: “因为我不想大张旗鼓地冲到崩落区，那个地方会害死我的人。要是我真的硬闯，到时候被那片区域害死的人，和死在政委手上的人相比恐怕会多三倍都不止。也就是说，我需要派一位刺客过去。政委的战士认识我的尖啸者，但没人认识你。而且你也别无选择，也就是说，着件事情你会负责到底。”
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: «No quiero llevar a mi banda entera al Sector Destrozado. El lugar matará tres veces más de mis hombres que la gente del Comisario. Por eso tengo que mandar a un asesino. Los guerreros del Comisario conocen a mis Aulladores, pero nadie sabe quién eres tú. Además, no tienes elección así que te ocuparás del trabajo».
languages.original_text: "I don't want to drag my whole gang into the Mangled Sector — the place will kill off three times more fighters than the Commissar's crew will. That means I need to send in an assassin. The Commissar's fighters know my Shriekers. But nobody knows you. And besides, you don't have a choice, which means you'll see it through to the end."

traits.locale_text: «No quiero llevar a mi banda entera al Sector Destrozado. El lugar matará tres veces más de mis hombres que la gente del Comisario. Por eso tengo que mandar a un asesino. Los guerreros del Comisario conocen a mis Aulladores, pero nadie sabe quién eres tú. Además, no tienes elección así que te ocuparás del trabajo».
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: 「部下を切り裂かれた星域に連れていくつもりは毛頭ない――あの場所に立ち入れば、コミッサーのクルーにやられるより3倍もの死傷者が出るだろう。つまり、アサシンを送り込まねばならない。コミッサーの戦闘員は俺のシュリーカーを知っているが、貴様を知る者は誰もいない。それに、貴様には選択肢がないのだからやるしかない」
languages.original_text: "I don't want to drag my whole gang into the Mangled Sector — the place will kill off three times more fighters than the Commissar's crew will. That means I need to send in an assassin. The Commissar's fighters know my Shriekers. But nobody knows you. And besides, you don't have a choice, which means you'll see it through to the end."

traits.locale_text: 「部下を切り裂かれた星域に連れていくつもりは毛頭ない――あの場所に立ち入れば、コミッサーのクルーにやられるより3倍もの死傷者が出るだろう。つまり、アサシンを送り込まねばならない。コミッサーの戦闘員は俺のシュリーカーを知っているが、貴様を知る者は誰もいない。それに、貴様には選択肢がないのだからやるしかない」
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Ich will nicht meine ganze Bande in den Zerfleischten Sektor zerren — die Umgebung würde dreimal mehr Kämpfer töten als die Crew des Kommissars. Also muss ich einen Attentäter schicken. Die Kämpfer des Kommissars kennen meine Kreischer. Euch aber kennt niemand. Zudem habt Ihr gar keine andere Wahl, daher werdet Ihr es durchziehen."
languages.original_text: "I don't want to drag my whole gang into the Mangled Sector — the place will kill off three times more fighters than the Commissar's crew will. That means I need to send in an assassin. The Commissar's fighters know my Shriekers. But nobody knows you. And besides, you don't have a choice, which means you'll see it through to the end."

traits.locale_text: "Ich will nicht meine ganze Bande in den Zerfleischten Sektor zerren — die Umgebung würde dreimal mehr Kämpfer töten als die Crew des Kommissars. Also muss ich einen Attentäter schicken. Die Kämpfer des Kommissars kennen meine Kreischer. Euch aber kennt niemand. Zudem habt Ihr gar keine andere Wahl, daher werdet Ihr es durchziehen."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: « Je n'ai pas envie de traîner toute ma bande là-bas ; le Secteur condamné tuerait trois fois plus de mes combattants que les hommes du commissaire. Ça veut dire que je dois envoyer un assassin. Les combattants du commissaire connaissent mes Hurleurs, mais ils ne vous ont jamais {mf|vu|vue}, vous. De toute manière, vous n'avez pas d'autre choix que d'accomplir cette mission si vous tenez à la vie. »
languages.original_text: "I don't want to drag my whole gang into the Mangled Sector — the place will kill off three times more fighters than the Commissar's crew will. That means I need to send in an assassin. The Commissar's fighters know my Shriekers. But nobody knows you. And besides, you don't have a choice, which means you'll see it through to the end."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai pas envie de traîner toute ma bande là-bas ; le Secteur condamné tuerait trois fois plus de mes combattants que les hommes du commissaire. Ça veut dire que je dois envoyer un assassin. Les combattants du commissaire connaissent mes Hurleurs, mais ils ne vous ont jamais {mf|vu|vue}, vous. De toute manière, vous n'avez pas d'autre choix que d'accomplir cette mission si vous tenez à la vie. »
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Çetemin tamamını Biçimsiz Sektör'e sürüklemek istemiyorum. O melun sektör, Komiser'in tayfasıyla muhtemel bir çatışmaya kıyasla üç katı fazla adam öldürür. Yani bana suikastçı lazım. Komiser'in adamları, Çığırtkanlarımı tanıyor. Seni tanıyan yok. Başka seçeneğin de yok. Bu işi halledeceksin, o kadar."
languages.original_text: "I don't want to drag my whole gang into the Mangled Sector — the place will kill off three times more fighters than the Commissar's crew will. That means I need to send in an assassin. The Commissar's fighters know my Shriekers. But nobody knows you. And besides, you don't have a choice, which means you'll see it through to the end."

traits.locale_text: "Çetemin tamamını Biçimsiz Sektör'e sürüklemek istemiyorum. O melun sektör, Komiser'in tayfasıyla muhtemel bir çatışmaya kıyasla üç katı fazla adam öldürür. Yani bana suikastçı lazım. Komiser'in adamları Çığırtkanlarımı tanıyor. Ama seni tanıyan yok. Başka seçeneğin de yok. Bu işi halledeceksin, o kadar."
traits.speaker: Anger
